videos.title: Cute combo provides infinite value in Standard
videos.description:
This Standard Jeskai Dragons Combo deck uses the new Tarkir: Dragonstorm card Shiko, Paragon of the Way to copy Three Blind Mice for infinite value.

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: UPGRADED Teval vs Zurgo vs Ureni vs Felothar - Worst Possible Commander Show 153
videos.description:
We take the Precons from magic the Gathering most recent set, Tarkir Dragonstorm, and make a few changes to power them up and see what's the worst thing the new precons can really do!
More Tarkir Commander: https://youtu.be/DljY2xKvB20?si=X9OGVHJ76wLhhNi_
